@graph.name: Wholesale Gorilla
@graph.description: A comprehensive wholesale management app for Shopify stores that enables B2B merchants to manage tiered pricing, bulk orders, customer segmentation, and wholesale-only collections with seamless integration.
featureList: Custom registration forms for wholesale onboarding
Quick order form for bulk purchasing

audience.audienceType: B2B Merchants, Shopify Store Owners, Wholesale Businesses

@graph.name: How to Set Up Wholesale Gorilla for Your Shopify Store
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing wholesale functionality using Wholesale Gorilla app

step.name: Install the App
step.text: Install Wholesale Gorilla from the Shopify App Store and start your 30-day free trial

step.name: Configure Registration Forms
step.text: Set up custom registration forms to capture wholesale customer information including tax IDs and business licenses

step.name: Set Tiered Pricing
step.text: Configure different pricing levels for wholesale customers based on purchase volume and customer segments

step.name: Create Wholesale Collections
step.text: Set up wholesale-only product collections that are hidden from retail customers

step.name: Configure Order Minimums
step.text: Set minimum quantities or order amounts to ensure wholesale buyers meet required thresholds

mainEntity.name: Is Wholesale Gorilla easy to set up?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the app is designed to integrate seamlessly with Shopify and comes with detailed setup instructions.

mainEntity.name: Can I use this app for both retail and wholesale?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Wholesale Gorilla allows you to manage both retail and wholesale customers from one Shopify store.

mainEntity.name: Does the app offer customization options?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can customize registration forms, pricing tiers, and even the look and feel of the wholesale section.

mainEntity.name: Is there a free trial available?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the app offers a 30-day free trial, allowing you to explore all its features before committing.
Wholesale Gorilla offers responsive email and chat support to help with any issues you encounter.

@graph.name: Wholesale Gorilla Review - Preferred By B2B Merchants
@graph.description: Comprehensive review of Wholesale Gorilla Shopify app covering features, benefits, pros & cons, and user feedback for B2B merchants.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Tiered Pricing
hasDefinedTerm.description: Different pricing levels for wholesale customers based on purchase volume or customer segments

hasDefinedTerm.name: Wholesale-Only Collections
hasDefinedTerm.description: Product collections that are hidden from retail customers and only accessible to registered wholesale buyers

hasDefinedTerm.name: Net Payment Terms
hasDefinedTerm.description: Payment options that align with wholesale buyer needs, including net 30 or other extended payment terms

hasDefinedTerm.name: Order Minimums
hasDefinedTerm.description: Minimum quantities or order amounts required for wholesale purchases to qualify for discounts

hasDefinedTerm.name: Customer Segmentation
hasDefinedTerm.description: Organizing wholesale customers into groups for targeted pricing and access control

@graph.description: Practical applications and scenarios for using Wholesale Gorilla in B2B commerce

itemListElement.name: B2B Marketplace Management
itemListElement.description: Managing separate retail and wholesale operations from a single Shopify store

itemListElement.name: Volume-Based Pricing
itemListElement.description: Implementing tiered pricing structures based on purchase quantities or customer loyalty

itemListElement.name: Wholesale Customer Onboarding
itemListElement.description: Streamlining the registration and approval process for new wholesale clients

itemListElement.name: Bulk Order Processing
itemListElement.description: Facilitating large quantity orders through optimized ordering interfaces

itemListElement.name: Exclusive Product Access
itemListElement.description: Providing wholesale customers with access to exclusive products and pricing
